prasāraṇākuñcanāśaktirugrarujatā

ni mṛdūni ca ||

jñitaḥ || dantamāṃsāni śīryante yasmin ṣṭhīvati cāsakṛt |

| galopasaṃrodhakarais tathāṅkurair nihantyas unvyādhir ayaṃ hi rohiṇī ||

tām vadanti tisraś ca tāstvād ita eva kṛcchrā ||

kaṇṭakaśūkabhūtaḥ | kharaḥ sthiraḥ śastranipātasādhyas tat kaṇṭaśālūkam iti bruvanti ||

dāhaḥ sakakaṇḍuro 'pāvyagururm mṛduś ca | nāmnaikavṛndaḥ parikīrtyate 'sau vyādhir bbalāsakṣatajaḥ prasūtaḥ ||

śataghnirūpā ||

yugater nnihantā | kaphena jāto rudhirānvitena gale galaughaḥ paṭhito bhiṣagbhiḥ ||

ṣṭeṣv anilāyateṣu jñeyaḥ sa rogaḥ śvasanāts varaghnaḥ ||

praṇutsarvvakṛto vikāraḥ ||
